description: In the U.S. military's most comprehensive report addressing unconfirmed UFO sightings, defense officials concluded that most sightings dating back to 1945 were of ordinary origin.
title: Pentagon finds 'no evidence' of alien technology in new UFO report

description: In just a week there have been two mass kidnappings in Nigeria. Hundreds of women and children have been kidnapped in recent days in Africa's most populous country.
title: 10 years after Chibok, Nigeria's mass kidnappings return with a vengeance

description: Akira Toriyama has died at 68. He was known globally for his best-selling manga series Dragon Ball, which gave rise to the popular anime series Dragon Ball Z, multiple films, and video games.
title: Why 'Dragon Ball' creator Akira Toriyama was so important to the world of anime

description: The series, currently titled The Gates, will follow the lives of a wealthy Black family in a posh, gated community. There's no word yet about when the show will air or who will star in it.
title: CBS is developing its first Black daytime soap opera in 35 years

description: Former President of Honduras Juan Orlando Hernández has been found guilty on charges relating to drug trafficking and weapons possession, in a trial by jury in New York.
title: U.S. court convicts ex-president of Honduras of aiding drug traffickers

description: Special prosecutors face an uphill battle in trying to convict the actor over the tragic death of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins, a former federal prosecutor says.
title: What's next for the Alec Baldwin 'Rust' case after film's armorer was found guilty?

description: The term is relatively new, but companies have long hidden price hikes in plain sight by changing package sizing. Now the debate is getting political.
title: The State of 'Shrinkflation': Why Biden called out skimpy bags of potato chips

description: The two-time WNBA champion Las Vegas Aces have accomplished a first for the women's pro basketball league, selling out of season ticket memberships for 2024.
title: Las Vegas Aces make WNBA history as first team to sell out season tickets

description: The Motion Picture Academy hopes that more popular films, an earlier showtime, and increased diversity among nominees will lead to higher viewership.
title: What to expect at the Oscars: The bomb, the bombshell, and the possible comeback

description: George Santos, disgraced and ejected from the House, says he will seek office again on Long Island. He'll face Rep. Nick LaLota in the GOP primary.
title: George Santos, ejected from House and facing fraud trial, will run again in N.Y.

description: President Biden made the case for his reelection during the State of the Union address. The Republican National Committee chooses new leadership today.
title: Takeaways from Biden's SOTU; Trump poised to take control of RNC

description: Israel says Palestinian attackers committed sexual violence on Oct. 7. Some accounts of rape were substantiated by a U.N. report, but the allegations continue to face intense scrutiny.
title: An Israeli responder's work on Oct. 7 shows the challenges of investigating atrocities

description: At least 29 states have considered legislation related to daylight saving time, including making it permanent year-round. But those laws won't take effect until Congress makes it legal.
title: What to know about the political debate around daylight saving time

description: Miami-Dade County has accused the operators of the Seaquarium of improperly caring for the grounds and animals. In August, the tourist attraction was under fire after the death of Lolita the orca.
title: Miami-Dade County moves to evict Miami Seaquarium

description: Jean Armour Polly was inducted into the Internet Hall of Fame in 2019 for evangelizing computers in public libraries, the precursor to the internet being offered as a core service in those spaces.
title: Meet the woman who helped libraries across the U.S. 'surf the internet'

description: Traumatic brain injuries from intimate partner violence are common, and potentially more severe than those seen in sports.
title: Domestic violence may leave telltale damage in the brain. Scientists want to find it

description: The speech — as well as the response — reflect how difficult the border issue has become ahead of the 2024 presidential election.
title: Biden spars with Republicans on border security during State of the Union

description: Why was the Oscars carpet champagne? Why is some subterranean worm-amphibian making milk? What's next for the American Samoa guy? Are there any records left for Caitlin Clark to break? Find out!
title: From rogue flooring to lactating worms, this news quiz is weird

description: Karen Seagraves is the kind of independent voter President Biden's campaign hopes to win over this election year. Here's how she saw last night's State of the Union address.
title: We watched the State of the Union with one undecided voter. She wasn't that impressed

description: A federal team continues to focus on construction flaws in the pool deck as it investigates the collapse of the Champlain Towers South condominium in Surfside, Fla. in 2021 which killed 98 people.
title: Investigators narrow search into cause of deadly Florida condo collapse in Surfside

description: Federal regulators call the week before clocks change "Vehicle Safety Recalls Week." It's a reminder to check on NHTSA.gov or the SaferCar app to see if your car has been recalled.
title: It's time to move your clocks forward — and to check if your car is being recalled

description: Reservoirs that furnish a large part of the Mexican capital have fallen to historic lows, as low rainfall, climate change and mismanagement exacerbate the problem.
title: Mexico City's long-running water problems are getting even worse

description: Friday is the 10th anniversary of the disappearance of flight MH370. The Boeing 777 left Malaysia bound for Beijing with 239 people on board, but took a sharp turn south and fell off the radar.
title: A decade later, parents of Chinese passengers on MH370 still ask about their children

description: Judge Lewis A. Kaplan said any financial harm to the Republican front-runner for the presidency results from Trump's slow response to the late-January verdict in the defamation case.
title: Judge denies Donald Trump's request to delay $83.3 million payment to E. Jean Carroll

description: In his State of the Union address Thursday, President Biden highlighted key achievements of his first term and made the case that voters should give him a second. Here are six highlights.
title: Key moments from Biden's 2024 State of the Union address you may have missed

description: President Biden used his State of the Union speech to highlight economic gains and draw a contrast with his GOP opponents. Polls shows many voters give Biden low marks for his economic stewardship.
title: Biden touts economic 'comeback' in election-year pitch to skeptical voters

description: Read President Biden's 2024 State of the Union speech as prepared for delivery.
title: Read President Biden's 2024 State of the Union address

description: In a likely foreshadowing of Democrats' messaging this fall, President Biden called out those who enabled the overturning of Roe v. Wade and asked voters to give him a Democratic Congress.
title: Alluding to Trump, Biden calls out Republicans 'bragging' about abortion bans
